main event: A person observed a bright silver, oval-shaped, luminous object in the sky.
interesting points: The object appeared to be cigar-shaped and made no sound as it quickly passed out of sight.
The person drew sketches of the object and how it was arranged with other objects.
The object's edges were sharply outlined.
The object was observed during the day, with the sun's position noted.
No photographs were available, but the person provided a detailed description of the sighting.
